name: Hand Painted Glass Nail File
description:
Price is for one hand painted glass nail file. They make perfect gifts or a lovely treat for yourself.  Please state design when ordering. From left to right: Butterfly, Blue Floral, Angel, Seahorse, Horse or Dolphin. The file measures 140mm in length and will be supplied in a presentation sleeve.

Designs are all handpainted and therefore unique. Please bear in mind small variations may appear between each file

Crystal nail files are made from a single piece of glass which does not wear down. It will last virtually for ever! It is delicate and effective, making it far more efficient than files made from conventional materials.

They are hygienic and easy to clean using a bleach solution or simply cleansing with soap and water. In the unlikely event of damage e.g. being dropped onto a hard surface it is always advisable to discard and replace the file for safety.

www.cumbria-crystal.com

name: Clear Glass Manicure and Pedicure Set
description:
Price is a set containing one clear glass manicure and pedicure file. They make perfect gifts or a lovely treat for yourself. The file manicure file measures 140mm and the pedicure file measures 200mm in length. They will both be supplied in a presentation sleeve. The creative amongst you could even decorate your own files for a totally unique gift.

Crystal nail files are made from a single piece of glass which does not wear down. It will last virtually for ever! It is delicate and effective, making it far more efficient than files made from conventional materials.

name: Coloured Silver Charm Glass Nail File
description:
Price is for one coloured nail file with a silver charm and crystal decoration. They make perfect gifts or a lovely treat for yourself. Please state colour when ordering. There are many colour/design combinations available. The photo above shows each charm style and various colours and the drop dow list below gives you the available colour options for that style. The file measures 140mm in length and will be supplied in a presentation sleeve.

Please email me if you would like a close up image of a particular file at nailfiles@cumbria-crystal.com
